about_the_game:
The glory of Rome awaits you in this addictive war strategy and Tower Defense game.

Play Grow Empire: Rome and turn your small village into the greatest and most powerful empire in history.

Strategically upgrade your walls, towers, and warriors. Protect your city from elephant attacks, siege weapons, and waves of enemy troops by covering the sky with arrows and fire.

Crush your enemies, face Egyptian, Italian, Gallic, Iberian, and Carthaginian warriors, and expand your empire across Europe and Africa. Conquer their cities and obtain chests with gems, gold, potions, and cards! Defend your colonies and fill your bank with gold. Become the leader that Rome claims.

Create an invincible army of heroes, legionnaires, mercenaries, and siege weapons to make you the most feared Caesar in history.

⚔ Features: ⚔
★ +1500 waves that will test your defense
★ +155 cities to conquer
★ +1000 building upgrades
★ +35 different Roman troops to boost your army
★ 5 enemy factions that will test your thirst for glory
★ Siege weapons and war elephants!
★ 7 heroes with unique abilities to help you conquer everything
★ Upgrade your heroes with 50 new levels
★ Test your skill as an archer and get epic rewards in the Coliseum
★ +18 Skills of 20 different levels to improve your attack and defense strategy
★ 18 offensive and defensive cards to enhance your gameplay strategy
